links.*: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

wikitext.*:
<noinclude>{{month|August}}
Events that occurred on 6 August.
==On Earth==
</noinclude>
* '''[[1965]]''' - Linguist [[Carl F. Hostetter]] is born. 
* '''[[1966]]''' - [[Glasgow Herald (6 August 1966)|''Glasgow Herald'' (6 August 1966)]], including an [[Index:Interviews with J.R.R. Tolkien|interview]] with [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] by [[Daphne Castell]], is published.
* '''[[1969]]''' - Voice actor [[Chris Edgerly]] is born.
* '''[[1990]]''' - [[Mythcon 21]] at [[wikipedia:California State University|California State University]] in [[wikipedia:Long Beach, California|Long Beach]].
* '''[[1994]]''' - [[Mythcon 25]] at [[wikipedia:American University|American University]], [[wikipedia:Washington, D.C.|Washington, D.C.]]
* '''[[1995]]''' - [[Mythcon 26]] in [[wikipedia:Berkeley, California|Berkeley]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[2001]]''' - [[Mythcon 32]] in [[wikipedia:Berkeley, California|Berkeley]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[2002]]''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'' is released on DVD and VHS.
* '''[[2005]]''' - [http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Minya] - 1st International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[wikipedia:Stockholm|Stockholm]], [[wikipedia:Sweden|Sweden]].
* '''[[2006]]''' - [[Mythcon 37]] at [[wikipedia:University of Oklahoma|University of Oklahoma]], [[wikipedia:Norman, Oklahoma|Norman]].
* '''[[2007]]''' - [[Mythcon 38]] in [[wikipedia:Berkeley, California|Berkeley]], [[wikipedia:California|California]].
* '''[[2009]]''' - [http://omentielva.com/ Omentielva Nelya] - 3rd International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[wikipedia:Whitehaven|Whitehaven]], [[wikipedia:England|England]].
* '''[[2012]]''' - [[Mythcon 43]] at University of California, [[wikipedia:Berkeley, California|Berkeley]].
* '''[[2015]]''' - [[Omentielva|Omentielva Enquea]] - Sixth International Conference on [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]'s Invented Languages in [[Greisinger Museum]], Switzerland.
